languages.text: "Этот шпиль пронизан энергией тысяч истерзанных душ. Я чувствую их ярость и желание отомстить. И их беспомощность".

traits.locale_text: "Этот шпиль пронизан энергией тысяч истерзанных душ. Я чувствую их ярость и желание отомстить. И их беспомощность".

languages.text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."
languages.original_text: "Этот шпиль пронизан энергией тысяч истерзанных душ. Я чувствую их ярость и желание отомстить. И их беспомощность".

traits.locale_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness, too."
"The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness, too."
"The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."
"The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."
"The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

languages.text: «La torre está impregnada de la energía de un millar de almas atormentadas. Puedo sentir su furia y su sed de venganza. Y su indefensión».
languages.original_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

traits.locale_text: «La torre está impregnada de la energía de un millar de almas atormentadas. Puedo sentir su furia y su sed de venganza. Y su indefensión».

languages.text: 「この尖塔には、拷問を受けた千もの魂のエネルギーが充満している。彼らの怒りと、復讐への渇望を感じる。彼らの無力さもな」
languages.original_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

traits.locale_text: 「この尖塔には、拷問を受けた千もの魂のエネルギーが充満している。彼らの怒りと、復讐への渇望を感じる。彼らの無力さもな」

languages.text: “几千个灵魂在此饱受折磨，它们的能量弥漫在这座尖塔上。我能感觉到他们的愤怒、对复仇的渴望，还有无助。”
languages.original_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

traits.locale_text: “几千个灵魂在此饱受折磨，它们的能量弥漫在这座尖塔上。我能感觉到他们的愤怒、对复仇的渴望，还有无助。”

languages.text: « L'énergie d'un millier d'âmes torturées imprègne la tour. Je sens leur fureur, leur soif de vengeance... Et leur désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

traits.locale_text: « L'énergie d'un millier d'âmes torturées imprègne la tour. Je sens leur fureur, leur soif de vengeance... Et leur désespoir. »

languages.text: "Dieser Turm ist durchdrungen von der Energie tausender gequälter Seelen. Ich spüre ihre Wut und ihre Rachsucht. Und wie hilflos sie sind."
languages.original_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Turm ist durchdrungen von der Energie tausender gequälter Seelen. Ich spüre ihre Wut und ihre Rachsucht. Und wie hilflos sie sind."

languages.text: "Izdırap içindeki binlerce ruhun enerjisi, bu kuleye nüfuz etmiş. Öfkelerini ve intikama nasıl susadıklarını hissedebiliyorum. Çaresizliklerini de..."
languages.original_text: "The energy of a thousand tortured souls permeates this spire. I can feel their fury and thirst for vengeance. And their helplessness."

traits.locale_text: "Izdırap içindeki binlerce ruhun enerjisi, bu kuleye nüfuz etmiş. Öfkelerini ve intikama nasıl susadıklarını hissedebiliyorum. Çaresizliklerini de..."
